metadata.name: Ensure that LUKS is configured on worker nodes
metadata.description:
OpenShift has an installation-time flag that can enable LUKS (TPM2 or TANG) full disk encryption at installation. The object 
luks
must be present at install time in the 
machineconfig
file prepared with the 
install-config.yaml
file.
metadata.rationale:
Use of weak or untested encryption algorithms undermines the purposes of utilizing encryption to
protect data. The system must implement cryptographic modules adhering to the higher
standards approved by the federal government since this provides assurance they have been tested
and validated.
